text: Jack Rollins (born Jacob Rabinowitz; March 23, 1915 â€“ June 18, 2015) was an American movie producer and manager of many successful comedians and television personalities. He was known for working with Woody Allen and David Letterman. His last movie to be produced was Woody Allen's 2011 movie Midnight in Paris. ==Other websites== * Category:1915 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Jack Rollins (producer)
